!Priest of Resurrection Greetings, adventurer! The battle for glory has begun, do you want to participate? You will find the glory by passing this tests! Battle for glory consists of five large parts. Each part is a test of your best qualities and abilities. The first part - is a test of your battle skills, the second part - is a test of your logical abilities, and the third part - is a test of your stealth and evasion, the fourth - is a struggle with destiny, check good luck! Finally, the last part is the battle with the demon which has incredible power, but I'll tell you later more about that! So, are you interested in my words? [npc_%objectId%_Quest| I want to participate!]
